greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, equal to the matrix 4th power of triangle A136220.
formula: Column k of this triangle = column 1 of U^(k+1) where U = A136228.
example: where column k = column 1 of U^(k+1);
where column k of U = column 0 of P^(3k+1) and
program: (PARI) {T(n,k)=local(P=Mat(1),U,PShR);if(n>0,for(i=0,n, PShR=matrix(#P,#P, r,c, if(r>=c,if(r==c,1,if(c==1,0,P[r-1,c-1]))));U=P*PShR^2; U=matrix(#P+1, #P+1, r,c, if(r>=c, if(r<#P+1,U[r,c], if(c==1,(P^3)[ #P,1],(P^(3*c-1))[r-c+1,1])))); P=matrix(#U, #U, r,c, if(r>=c, if(r<#R,P[r,c], (U^c)[r-c+1,1])))));(P^4)[n+1,k+1]}
xref: Cf. A136229 (column 0); related tables: A136220 (P), A136228 (U).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 28 2008
